text: @NYGovCuomo At least what you can do is admit that you have BLOOD on your hands Cuomo after putting COVID19 PATIENTS in Nursing Homes I can't wait till your in a Nursing Home when the Virus pokes it's head out and whoever the Governor might be puts them in with you
